oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various news segment excerpts - various radio stations
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of various news segment intros, outros, and contests for various radio stations.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) KLAC news intro (Pat McGuinness) -- (00:36) KKYX news intro (Pat Tullman) -- (00:53) WTID news intro (Pat Wilson) -- (01:14) KCMO news intro (Lake Williams) -- (01:47) WILK news intro ([Unidentified]) -- (01:59) WPIK news intro (Dave Hammond) -- (02:20) WINN news intro (Mark Daniels, Jim Walker) -- (02:43) KWMT news intro (Jerry Sheeter) -- (02:56) WMUS news intro ([Unidentified]) -- (03:17) KFOX news intro (Ralph Martin) -- (03:39) KFDI news intro ([Unidentified]) -- (03:55) news intro (Lyle Deon) -- (04:24) KCKN news intro (Mike Shannon) -- (05:20) WITL news intro (Theresa Baxter) -- (05:58) WSM news intro (Bob Barnes) -- (06:30) WIL news intro (Bob Tibbits) -- (07:06) WJEF news into (Frank Scott) -- (07:50) KEEN news intro ([Unidentified]) -- (08:26) KENR news intro (Frank Boardman) -- (08:48) KENR news intro -- (09:10) WRZP news intro -- (09:33) ABC news intro -- (09:41) WRCP news intro ([Unidentified]) -- (10:09) KCKC news intro ([Unidentified]) -- (10:35) CBS (Reid Collins) -- (10:45) various contest segments for various radio stations
